original_text: Being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.
korean_text: 마귀에게 시험을 받으시더라 이 모든 날에 아무 것도 잡수시지 아니하시니 날 수가 다하매 주리신지라

sentences.original_text: Being forty days tempted of the devil
sentences.korean_translation: 사십 일 동안 마귀에게 시험을 받으시며

sentences.original_text: And in those days he did eat nothing
